item.description:
Same topic, different venue and date.
Topic - Core Transformation

Truly an exquisite way to work with parts. Anytime you have an inner conflict, this can be seen as a 'part of you' wants to do one thing and another 'part of you' wants to do another. there are several techniques in NLP to deal with parts and this one is a great one.
Come learn and see how to do this. Bring your conflicts wink

Recommended Reading: Core Transformation: Reaching the Wellspring Within - If you wanted to read up on this technique, this is the book. You do not have to do any research or pre-work to attend this meeting.

Kevin

Kevin Martin
NLP Master Practitioner, Hypnotist
Positive Effects
Methuen, MA
(978) 273-5905
kenda_assoc@msn.com
www.poseffects.com----------------------------------
Helping people to help themselves.

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group
